item.text: In the same way, wives, be subject to your own husbands. Then, even if some are disobedient to the word, they will be won over without a word by the way you live,

when they <st data-num="2029" class="">see</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="53" class="">pure</st> and <st data-num="5401">reverent</st> <st data-num="391" class="">conduct</st>.<n id="1" />

Let <st data-num="3739">your</st><n id="1" /> beauty<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="1855" class="">external</st>—the <st data-num="1708" class="">braiding</st> of <st data-num="2359" class="">hair</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4025" class="">wearing</st> of <st data-num="5553">gold</st> jewelry<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="2889" class="">fine</st> <st data-num="2440" class="">clothes</st>—

<st data-num="235" class="">but</st> the <st data-num="2927" class="">inner</st> <st data-num="444" class="">person</st><n id="1" /> of the <st data-num="2588" class="">heart</st>, the lasting <st data-num="862" class="">beauty</st> of a <st data-num="4239">gentle</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2272" class="">tranquil</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">spirit</st>, <st data-num="3739" class="">which</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="4185" class="">precious</st> <st data-num="1799" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2316">God’s</st> <st data-num="1799" class="">sight</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3779">in the same way</st> the <st data-num="40" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">women</st> who <st data-num="1679" class="">hoped</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="4218">long ago</st> <st data-num="2885" class="">adorned</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">themselves</st> by <st data-num="5293">being subject</st> to <st data-num="2398" class="">their</st> <st data-num="435" class="">husbands</st>,

<st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> <st data-num="4564" class="">Sarah</st> who <st data-num="5219" class="">obeyed</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="11" class="">Abraham</st>, <st data-num="2564" class="">calling</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">lord</st>. You <st data-num="1096" class="">become</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">her</st> <st data-num="5043" class="">children</st><n id="2" /> when you <st data-num="15" class="">do what is good</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> have <st data-num="3361" class="">no</st> <st data-num="5399" class="">fear</st> in <st data-num="3367 4423">doing so</st>.<n id="3" />
Husbands, in the same way, treat your wives with consideration as the weaker partners and show them honor as fellow heirs of the grace of life. In this way nothing will hinder your prayers.
Finally, all of you be harmonious, sympathetic, affectionate, compassionate, and humble.

Do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="591" class="">return</st> <st data-num="2556" class="">evil</st> <st data-num="473" class="">for</st> <st data-num="2556" class="">evil</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="3059" class="">insult</st> <st data-num="473" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3059" class="">insult</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="5121" class="">instead</st> <st data-num="2127" class="">bless</st><n id="1" /> others<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> you were <st data-num="2564" class="">called</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2816" class="">inherit</st> a <st data-num="2129" class="">blessing</st>.

For

the one who wants to love life and see good days must keep his tongue from evil and his lips from uttering deceit.

And he must turn away from evil and do good;

he must seek peace and pursue it.

For the eyes of the Lord are upon the righteous and his ears are open to their prayer.

But the Lord’s face is against those who do evil.
For who is going to harm you if you are devoted to what is good?
But in fact, if you happen to suffer for doing what is right, you are blessed. But do not be terrified of them or be shaken.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="37" class="">set</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="37" class="">apart</st><n id="2" /> as <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">hearts</st> and <st data-num="104" class="">always</st> be <st data-num="2092" class="">ready</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="627" class="">give an answer</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">anyone</st> who <st data-num="154" class="">asks</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> the <st data-num="1680" class="">hope</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">possess</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="235">Yet</st> do it <st data-num="3326">with</st> <st data-num="4240">courtesy</st> <st data-num="2532">and</st> <st data-num="5401">respect</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2192" class="">keeping</st> a <st data-num="18" class="">good</st> <st data-num="4893" class="">conscience</st>, <st data-num="2443" class="">so that</st> those who <st data-num="1908" class="">slander</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="18" class="">good</st> <st data-num="391" class="">conduct</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> may be <st data-num="2617">put to shame</st> when they <st data-num="2635" class="">accuse</st> you.<n id="2" />
For it is better to suffer for doing good, if God wills it, than for doing evil.

Because Christ also suffered once for sins,

the just for the unjust,

to bring you to God,

by being put to death in the flesh

but by being made alive in the spirit.
In it he went and preached to the spirits in prison,
after they were disobedient long ago when God patiently waited in the days of Noah as an ark was being constructed. In the ark a few, that is eight souls, were delivered through water.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> this <st data-num="499" class="">prefigured</st> <st data-num="908" class="">baptism</st>, <st data-num="3739" class="">which</st> <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st> <st data-num="4982" class="">saves</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st><n id="1" />—<st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> the <st data-num="595">washing off</st> of <st data-num="4561" class="">physical</st> <st data-num="4509" class="">dirt</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> the <st data-num="1906" class="">pledge</st><n id="3" /> of a <st data-num="18" class="">good</st> <st data-num="4893" class="">conscience</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>—<st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> the <st data-num="386" class="">resurrection</st> of <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>,
who went into heaven and is at the right hand of God with angels and authorities and powers subject to him.
